sentences.sContent: They exerted considerable influence within the school.
sentences.sCn: 他们在校内施加了很大的影响力。

sentences.sContent: ...Swedish family-friendly policies tend to exert a negative influence on women's careers...
...Rising population combined with improved nutrition standards and shifting dietary preferences will exert pressure for increases in global food supply...
...the same motivation that can push people to exert more effort in a constructive way could also motivate people to be more likely to engage in unethical behaviors...

remMethod.val: ex(出) ＋ ert(能量， 活动) → 运用

trans.tranCn: 用， 尽； 运用， 行使
